data: üëã Hello! Welcome to the Hextra documentation!
data.features#Features: Beautiful Design - Inspired by Nextra, Hextra utilizes Tailwind CSS to offer a modern design that makes your site look outstanding. Responsive Layout and Dark Mode - It looks great on all devices, from mobile, tablet to desktop. Dark mode is also supported to accommodate various lighting conditions. Fast and Lightweight - Powered by Hugo, a lightning-fast static-site generator housed in a single binary file, Hextra keeps its footprint minimal. No JavaScript or Node.js are needed to use it. Full-text Search - Built-in offline full-text search powered by FlexSearch, no additional configuration required. Battery-included - Markdown, syntax highlighting, LaTeX math formulae, diagrams and Shortcodes elements to enhance your content. Table of contents, breadcrumbs, pagination, sidebar navigation and more are all automatically generated. Multi-language and SEO Ready - Multi-language sites made easy with Hugo‚Äôs multilingual mode. Out-of-the-box support is included for SEO tags, Open Graph, and Twitter Cards.

data.questions-or-feedback#Questions or Feedb: ‚ùì Hextra is still in active development. Have a question or feedback? Feel free to open an issue!
data.what-is-hextra#What is Hextra?:
Hextra is a modern, fast and batteries-included [Hugo][hugo] theme built with [Tailwind CSS][tailwind-css].
Designed for building beautiful websites for documentation, blogs, and websites, it provides out-of-the-box features and flexibility to meet various requirements.
